backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing pun templates and safe words, returning a pun by index with basic bounds and safety checks.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature mapping file linking implemented features to frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend React components, hooks, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining a custom OKLCH color theme for light and dark modes with global styling variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML bootstrap that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling UI layout, pun generation, recent history tracking, and visual theme elements.
frontend/src/components/PunPanel.tsx: Displays the latest pun with copy-to-clipboard support and shows a recent puns list.
frontend/src/components/RecentPunsList.t: Scrollable card rendering recent puns with simple styling and hover effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that initializes and manages the backend actor, updating when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeneratePun.ts: Mutation hook that calls the backend generatePun method and validates returned pun strings.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth state handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and OKLCH CSS variable theme for light/dark modes, including headings and global body styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, pending feature requests, and required branding assets for the NEAR Snark Pun Generator.
